title: “Multiplex/Multiplex Theatre Complex (MTC)” means a place of public entertainment for the purpose of exhibition of motion picture with multiple screens and or dramas and other social or cultural programs as described in Bombay Entertainment Duty Act 1923
clause_text: “Multiplex/Multiplex Theatre Complex (MTC)” means a place of public entertainment for the purpose of exhibition of motion picture with multiple screens and or dramas and other social or cultural programs as described in Bombay Entertainment Duty Act 1923.
